column31: Fuel Economy, Ride and Handling, Value
column32: You want everything. Well, practically everything a mainstream compact sedan can offer, but would rather not clean out the bank account. The 2020 Elantra has efficient engines, plenty of technology, refinement and an arguably pleasing design all at relatively reasonable prices.;
column33: Fuel economy in Eco model; Handling; Apple CarPlay, Android Auto connectivity; Wireless charging available;
column35: That requirement of “everything” involves all-wheel drive. At this level, the choices are few. The Subaru Impreza has it as standard, while the Mazda3 and Volkswagen Golf SportWagen have it on their options lists.;
